tasks.label: prisma:generate
tasks.detail: Generates the Prisma client based on the schema.

tasks.label: prisma:migrate
tasks.detail: Creates and applies a new database migration.

tasks.label: prisma:studio
tasks.detail: Opens the Prisma Studio GUI to view and edit data.

tasks.label: railway:migrate
tasks.command: railway run -- bash -lc "cd /app && npx prisma migrate deploy"
tasks.detail: Applies pending migrations to the Railway production database.

tasks.label: railway:seed
tasks.command: railway run -- bash -lc "cd /app && npm run seed"
tasks.detail: Seeds the Railway production database with initial data.

tasks.label: railway:shell
tasks.detail: Opens a shell into the Railway deployment environment.

tasks.label: Promote dev to main
tasks.command: git switch main && git merge --ff-only dev && git push origin main && git switch dev
tasks.detail: Merges the dev branch into main and pushes to origin.

tasks.label: Reset database & Polar
tasks.detail: Resets the Railway database and Polar.sh
